title: Hospital school
brief_description: At the Lord Mayor Treloar Cripples Hospital and College every facility for the treatment, education and vocational training of physically handicapped children is provided. This film shows the observation ward, the X-ray department, the operating theatres, the massage and exercise room, and the bright airy wards and sunny terraces where the children’s schooling takes place simultaneously with their medical treatment.
